name: Batman '66 Universe
description: The campy, pop-art universe that began with the classic 1960s TV show starring Adam West and Burt Ward. This continuity was officially continued decades later with two animated sequel films.

media.name: Batman: The Movie
media.timeline_note: This film was released between the first and second seasons of the TV series.

media.name: Batman: Return of the Caped Crusaders
media.timeline_note: An animated sequel film released for the 50th anniversary, featuring the voices of Adam West, Burt Ward, and Julie Newmar.

media.name: Batman vs. Two-Face
media.timeline_note: The final performance of Adam West as Batman, this animated sequel introduces a '66 version of Two-Face.
